  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Content Creator / Social Media Manager",
  "description": "Kuddy Cosmetics exemplifies sustainable, homegrown success in Nigeria&rsquo;s beauty sector&mdash;rising from a suitcase startup to a national brand with a loyal following, original product lines, extensive retail outlets, and digital innovation. Kudirat Fashola&rsquo;s journey reflects tenacity, entrepreneurial ingenuity, and a vision that continues to shape Africa&rsquo;s cosmetics industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos Mainland - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job&nbsp;Description


	A cosmetic store is looking for a creative, organized, and trend-savvy Content Creator / Social Media Manager to help us grow our online community and bring our brand story to life across all digital platforms.
	The Content Creator / Social Media Manager will be responsible for developing, executing, and managing the brand&rsquo;s online presence from creating high-quality visual and written content to engaging audiences and driving brand awareness, loyalty, and sales.


Responsibilities
The Social Media Manager / Content Creator will:


	Develop, execute and manage the social media strategy across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok,) to build the brand, engage customers and drive foot?traffic and online sales.
	Create high?quality visual and written content (photos, videos, reels, stories, captions) aligned with our brand voice in beauty, skincare and makeup.
	Work closely with marketing, store teams and product teams to highlight new launches, promotions, in-store events, tutorials, customer testimonials.
	Monitor, analyze and report on key metrics (engagement, reach, conversion) and use insights to optimize content and campaigns.
	Stay up to date on trends in beauty, social media, Nigeria &amp; African market, and propose creative ideas to keep our content fresh and relevant.
	Manage community engagement: respond to comments/messages, moderate discussions, build relationships with ambassadors/influencers.
	Coordinate with external creators/influencers when needed.
	Design and implement a monthly social media content calendar.


Requirements / Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Media, or related field (or equivalent experience).
	Proven experience (2&ndash;4 years or more) managing social media &amp; content for a brand (ideally in retail/beauty/fashion).
	Strong portfolio of content creation: social posts, videos, perhaps previous beauty/cosmetics work.
	Excellent visual storytelling skills: photography, video shooting, editing
	Good writing skills for social captions, blog?type posts, brand tone.
	Deep understanding of social platforms, current trends (especially Reels/TikTok/Shorts), algorithm changes, hashtags, engagement tactics.


Salary
N150,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and their portfolio to:&nbsp;Careers@kuddycosmetics.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Content Creator / Social Media Manager Job at Kuddy Cosmetics




        
    

        
        Kuddy Cosmetics exemplifies sustainable, homegrown success in Nigeria’s beauty sector—rising from a suitcase startup to a national brand with a loyal following, original product lines, extensive retail outlets, and digital innovation. Kudirat Fashola’s journey reflects tenacity, entrepreneurial ingenuity, and a vision that continues to shape Africa’s cosmetics industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Social Media Manager

Job Location: Lagos Mainland - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	A cosmetic store is looking for a creative, organized, and trend-savvy Content Creator / Social Media Manager to help us grow our online community and bring our brand story to life across all digital platforms.
	The Content Creator / Social Media Manager will be responsible for developing, executing, and managing the brand’s online presence from creating high-quality visual and written content to engaging audiences and driving brand awareness, loyalty, and sales.


Responsibilities
The Social Media Manager / Content Creator will:


	Develop, execute and manage the social media strategy across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok,) to build the brand, engage customers and drive foot?traffic and online sales.
	Create high?quality visual and written content (photos, videos, reels, stories, captions) aligned with our brand voice in beauty, skincare and makeup.
	Work closely with marketing, store teams and product teams to highlight new launches, promotions, in-store events, tutorials, customer testimonials.
	Monitor, analyze and report on key metrics (engagement, reach, conversion) and use insights to optimize content and campaigns.
	Stay up to date on trends in beauty, social media, Nigeria & African market, and propose creative ideas to keep our content fresh and relevant.
	Manage community engagement: respond to comments/messages, moderate discussions, build relationships with ambassadors/influencers.
	Coordinate with external creators/influencers when needed.
	Design and implement a monthly social media content calendar.


Requirements / Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Media, or related field (or equivalent experience).
	Proven experience (2–4 years or more) managing social media & content for a brand (ideally in retail/beauty/fashion).
	Strong portfolio of content creation: social posts, videos, perhaps previous beauty/cosmetics work.
	Excellent visual storytelling skills: photography, video shooting, editing
	Good writing skills for social captions, blog?type posts, brand tone.
	Deep understanding of social platforms, current trends (especially Reels/TikTok/Shorts), algorithm changes, hashtags, engagement tactics.


Salary
N150,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and their portfolio to: Careers@kuddycosmetics.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
